Text.Page:
You have activated your hidden skill.

Even if you're not used to your new skill yet, you should deploy it once.

By the grace of the goddess Velik, you were able to unlock your hidden skill.

You used this new skill to conquer old enemies in your heart and prepare yourself to face new dangers.

I have unlocked your hidden skill.

You are most certainly not yet used to your new power. I will take you to a place where you can test your new skill to your heart's content.

You know this place, right?

This place that exists in my nightmare, and yours.

You can try out your new skills on the dangers that are lurking in your subconscious.

You're so dependable!

I'm impressed you're so proficient at such a newly acquired skill. Arborea's fate is in your hands.

There's a hard road ahead, but I hope you'll continue along it.
